products.name: Heavy Duty Workbench
products.description: Robust 2-tier stainless steel industrial workbench. Simple, super-heavy-duty construction for handling massive loads in clean zones.
products.introduction: Uncompromising strength for heavy tasks. This Heavy-Duty 2-Tier Workbench eliminates the bells and whistles to focus on pure structural integrity. Built with oversized tubular framing and a thick-gauge top, it is designed to support heavy equipment or large valve assemblies. The lower shelf offers additional reinforced storage space.
features: Extra-heavy load capacity (200kg)
Fully Welded, Double-Skin Construction
Brushed Finish
SUS304 Adjustable Leveling Feet
Worktop Reinforced with PVC or Aluminum Honeycomb Core
application_scenarios: Heavy Device Assembly
Repair Station
Valve Maintenance

products.name: Gowning bench
products.description: 304 stainless steel gowning bench. Designed for minimal particle retention in critical gowning areas.
products.introduction: Constructed from premium-grade stainless steel, this gowning bench features a sophisticated circular arc design and a reinforced double-layer panel for superior structural integrity. The unit is meticulously fabricated using seamless welding techniques and polished to a high-luster finish, effectively eliminating all hygienic dead zones to ensure full compliance with stringent sterile environment protocols.
features: Full Welding: Ensures no crevices for particulate accumulation or microbial growth.
Polished Finish: Provides a non-shedding, easy-to-sanitize surface compatible with cleanroom cleaning agents.
Reinforced Design: Provides structural stability for industrial laboratory use while maintaining a minimalist profile.
application_scenarios: Gowning Rooms
CNC Change Areas
Sterile Corridors

products.name: Mobile Storage Bin
products.description: Mobile stainless steel bulk storage bin with hinged lid. Ideal for transporting and storing bulk ingredients or waste in cleanroom areas.
products.introduction: Versatile mobile storage for bulk materials. This Mobile Storage Bin features a heavy-duty stainless steel chassis with a hinged lid, protecting contents from contamination during transport. Its smooth, seamless interior ensures standard-compliant cleaning, while the robust casters allow for easy maneuvering of heavy loads. Perfect for moving raw materials, waste, or laundry through classified zones.
features: Hinged stainless steel lid with handle
Seamless interior construction for easy cleaning
Heavy-duty swivel casters
SUS 304 stainless steel
Large capacity for bulk items
Push handle for ergonomic transport
application_scenarios: Cleanroom Material Transport
Waste Collection
Liquid Transfer

products.name: Mixing Tank
products.description: Mixing tank are vessels or totes mounted onto a frame where the single-use biocontainers are installed
products.introduction: Precision mixing for sanitary applications. This Pharmaceutical-Grade Mixer is crafted from 316L stainless steel with a mirror-finish internal surface (Ra < 0.4μm) to prevent residue adherence. The vessel is designed for full Clean-In-Place (CIP) compatibility.
features: 316L Stainless Steel contact surfaces (Ra < 0.4µm)
For magnetic drive mixer
application_scenarios: Media Preparation
Buffer Formulation
Chemical Blending

products.name: Wash Rack Lifting Trolley for Cleaning Machines
products.description: Wash Rack Transfer Trolley – Designed for transporting washer racks and conducting offline cleaning efficacy testing.
products.introduction: The equipment is constructed from 316L stainless steel and features 316L sanitary tubing with orbital welds. It is equipped with SKF lifting columns, a fully electropolished surface finish, and is powered by a 24V DC battery.
features: Lifting Range: 580 mm – 980 mm
Max. Load Capacity: 400 kg
Rechargeable Lithium Battery
Remote-Controlled Lifting
Offline Cleaning Efficacy Testing
Electropolished finish
Customizable for specific equipment footprints
application_scenarios: Wash Rack Transfer
Cleaning Efficacy Assessment of Washed Items

products.name: Wash Rack for Cleaning Machine
products.description: Wash Rack with Integrated Piping and Spray Nozzles Custom-designed wash rack tailored to specific load items.
products.introduction: The entire rack is constructed from 316L stainless steel, featuring a piping system made of 316L sanitary tubing. All piping is welded to sanitary standards, ensuring smooth, consistent internal and external weld seams. The unit utilizes PEEK nozzles and is designed to match the operating water pressure of the washing machine. This rack can be transported into the washer via a transfer trolley, where it connects to the machine's internal piping system to clean loaded parts. It also supports offline cleaning efficacy verification while docked on the transfer trolley. The entire rack features an electropolished surface finish.
features: Construction Material: Entire rack structure manufactured from 316L Stainless Steel
Sanitary Piping System: Made of 316L sanitary tubing. Welded to sanitary standards to ensure smooth, consistent internal and external seams.
High-Performance Nozzles: Equipped with durable PEEK nozzles for optimal chemical resistance and spray pattern.
Pressure Compatibility: Designed to match the specific operating water pressure of the connected washing machine.
In-Washer Cleaning: Seamlessly transports into the washer via trolley and connects to the machine’s internal water supply.
Offline Verification: Supports cleaning efficacy testing while docked on the transfer trolley outside the machine.
Surface Finish: Fully electropolished for superior hygiene and corrosion resistance.
application_scenarios: Facility Cleaning
Spill Response
Daily Sanitization

products.name: Pass Through Cabinet
products.description: Static pass-through with mechanical interlock. Double-wall stainless steel construction prevents cross-contamination between classified zones.
products.introduction: Control contamination at the source. Our Pass Through Cabinet serves as a barrier between zones of different cleanliness levels. The robust Mechanical Interlock System ensures that one door remains locked while the other is open, preventing direct air exchange. The interior chamber features coved corners (rounded radius) to eliminate particle traps and allow for thorough disinfection.
features: Material Options: 304L/316L stainless steel
Internal stainless steel frames for added support
Windows
Interlocked and/or self-closing doors
application_scenarios: Material Transfer
Sample Pass-through
Pharmacy Compounding
Acid, base, or solvent chemical pass through and storage

products.name: Cleanroom Computer Workstation
products.description: Flush-mount stainless steel computer enclosure with keyboard tray. Protects IT hardware in wash-down and sterile environments.
products.introduction: Integrate digital workflows without compromising cleanliness. This Flush-Mount PC Enclosure is designed to house standard monitors and keyboards within the cleanroom wall, eliminating horizontal surfaces that collect dust. The sealed unit features a hinged glass door for monitor access and a fold-down or integrated keyboard station, all constructed from corrosion-resistant 304 stainless steel.
features: Flush-mount design for seamless wall integration
Tempered glass screen protection
Integrated keyboard shelf/compartment
Sealed cable entry points
Resistant to biological and chemical agents
Ventilated for equipment cooling
application_scenarios: HMI Terminals
Cleanroom Data Entry
Digital SOP Stations

products.name: Multi-Tier Trolley
products.description: A Cleanroom Multi-Tier Trolley is a high-performance transport solution engineered from non-corrosive, non-shedding materials (typically 304 or 316L stainless steel).
products.introduction: A high-grade, mobile storage and transport solution specifically designed for sterile or particulate-controlled environments. Its primary purpose is to move delicate instruments, chemicals, or sterile products through different zones (such as from a gowning room to a Grade A lab) without introducing "bio-burden" or metallic dust. Built with a focus on non-shedding materials and easy-to-clean surfaces, these trolleys are essential for optimizing workflow efficiency while adhering to ISO classification standards.
features: Material Construction: Usually made from 304 or 316L Grade Stainless Steel. This offers superior corrosion resistance against harsh disinfectants like IPA (Isopropyl Alcohol) or hydrogen peroxide.
Electropolished Finish: Many models feature an electropolished surface that reduces microscopic surface roughness, ensuring bacteria have nowhere to hide.
ESD (Electrostatic Discharge) Safety: For electronics manufacturing, carts are equipped with conductive wheels and grounding chains to prevent static buildup that could fry sensitive components.
Non-Marking Castors: The wheels are typically made of high-quality polyurethane or synthetic rubber that leaves no scuff marks on epoxy cleanroom floors.
Ergonomic Design: Tubular handles are seamlessly welded (not bolted) to eliminate "dead spots" where dust can accumulate.
Perforated vs. Solid Shelves: * Solid: Prevents drips from reaching lower tiers.
Perforated: Allows for laminar airflow to pass through the cart, maintaining the cleanroom's air pressure equilibrium.
application_scenarios: Pharmaceuticals: Moving vials, syringes, or sterilized glassware.
Semiconductors: Transporting silicon wafers in FOUPs.
Hospitals: Moving sterile surgical kits within operating theaters.
Research Labs: Organizing chemicals and samples across different containment zones.

products.name: Fridge Trolley
products.description: A high-grade stainless steel transport system designed for moving temperature-sensitive biologicals, chemicals, or samples through cleanroom environments. It combines ISO-rated cleanliness compatibility with integrated cooling or insulated storage to maintain specific thermal conditions.
products.introduction: In sterile environments, the "last mile" of transport—moving a product from a long-term medical refrigerator to a processing bench—is a critical vulnerability. A Cleanroom Fridge Trolley bridges this gap. Constructed primarily from 304 or 316L stainless steel, these trolleys are non-shedding, corrosion-resistant, and designed with smooth surfaces to prevent the accumulation of particulates and bacteria.
features: Sterile Construction: Fully welded stainless steel frames with a brushed or electropolished finish to withstand aggressive VHP (Vaporized Hydrogen Peroxide) or alcohol-based cleaning agents.
Advanced Mobility: Equipped with non-marking, ESD-safe (Electrostatic Dissipative) wheels to prevent static build-up and ensure floor integrity.
Temperature Management: Features either active refrigeration (battery-powered) or passive cooling (high-density insulation with cold-plate slots).
Ergonomic Design: Smooth, continuous-weld handles and "no-snag" corners to comply with safety and hygiene protocols.
Digital Monitoring: Often includes integrated LED displays for real-time temperature logging and alarm systems for deviations.
application_scenarios: Pharmaceuticals: Transporting vaccines, insulin, or active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) between clean zones.
Biotechnology: Moving live cell cultures, enzymes, or tissue samples that require strict 2°C to 8°C environments.
Medical Research: Transferring blood plasma or sensitive reagents from cold storage to testing stations.
Semiconductors: Handling specialized chilled chemicals or photoresists that are sensitive to both particles and heat.

products.name: Garment Cabinet
products.description: A high-performance storage unit, typically made of stainless steel, designed to store cleanroom apparel in a sterile, organized, and often HEPA-filtered environment to prevent dust and microbial accumulation on garments.
products.introduction: The Garment Cabinet is a staple of the "gowning room" or "ante-room". Its primary purpose is to act as a buffer between the outside world and the sterile production zone. By providing a dedicated space for hanging or shelving cleanroom attire, these cabinets minimize garment handling and exposure to ambient air, which significantly extends the life and sterility of the clothing.
features: Air Filtration (Optional but Common): Integrated HEPA or ULPA filters that provide a continuous flow of laminar air (Class 100/ISO 5) over the garments to blow away any settling particles.
Material Integrity: Constructed from 304 or 316L Stainless Steel for easy wipe-down and resistance to sterilization chemicals.
Sloping Top: A slanted roof design to prevent the accumulation of dust and to discourage the storage of items on top of the unit.
Static Dissipation: Often features ESD-safe glass or acrylic doors to prevent the buildup of static electricity that attracts dust.
Configurable Interiors: Includes a mix of hanging rails, adjustable shelving for folded items, and dedicated compartments for "cleanroom shoes" or "clogs."
application_scenarios: Aseptic Staging: Maintaining the sterility of gowns and hoods used in pharmaceutical filling suites.
Static Prevention: Storing ESD-safe "bunny suits" for semiconductor and microelectronics assembly.
Contamination Control: Protecting low-linting apparel used in aerospace and high-precision optics labs.
Cross-Zone Buffer: Separating garments used in different bio-safety levels (BSL) to prevent cross-contamination.
Surgical Integrity: Housing specialized footwear and headgear for ultra-clean hospital operating theaters.
Visitor Management: Providing a sterile storage point for temporary gowns used by guests or auditors.

products.name: Nitrogen Cabinet
products.description: A hermetically sealed storage system that replaces internal atmosphere with pressurized nitrogen gas to achieve near-zero humidity (typically <1% to 10% RH) and an inert, non-reactive environment for high-value sensitive components.
products.introduction: In cleanroom operations, moisture and oxygen are "invisible contaminants." A Nitrogen Cabinet solves this by "purging"—forcing nitrogen into the cabinet to push out heavier, moisture-laden air through one-way relief valves. Because nitrogen is an inert gas, it creates a stable "blanket" around materials, making it the gold standard for long-term storage of semiconductors, optics, and reactive chemicals.
features: Automatic Purge Control: Uses RH (Relative Humidity) sensors to trigger N2 flow only when humidity rises (e.g., after a door opens), significantly reducing gas consumption.
Airtight Construction: Built from 304/316L Stainless Steel or Static-Dissipative PVC with reinforced door frames and non-outgassing gaskets.
Plenum Distribution: Internal "plenum" walls with perforated holes ensure even gas distribution across all shelves, preventing "moisture pockets."
Pressure Management: Integrated flow meters and pressure relief valves prevent over-pressurization while maintaining a positive pressure seal against outside dust.
Rapid Recovery: Able to return to target humidity levels (e.g., <5% RH) within minutes of closing the door, much faster than desiccant-based systems.
application_scenarios: Wafer & Chip Storage: Preventing the oxidation of silicon wafers, lead frames, and microchips between manufacturing steps.
MSD Protection: Safely housing Moisture Sensitive Devices (MSDs) to prevent the "popcorn effect" (cracking) during later solder reflow processes.
Optical Preservation: Storing high-precision lenses and laser crystals to prevent surface fogging and "glass disease" caused by humidity.
Biotech Stability: Protecting hygroscopic (moisture-absorbing) powders, DNA samples, and enzymes that degrade in the presence of oxygen.
Aerospace Electronics: Long-term preservation of critical avionics and sensors that must remain in a "factory-fresh" state for years.
Museum & Archive: Preserving rare artifacts or sensitive film that would otherwise deteriorate through oxidative aging.

products.name: Sink
products.description: A precision-engineered, stainless steel sanitation station featuring a seamless, crevice-free design and hands-free operation to maintain strict hygiene protocols in controlled environments.
products.introduction: The cleanroom sink is the primary defense against cross-contamination at the entry or exit of a sterile zone. Standard sinks have joints and overflows where bacteria can thrive; cleanroom sinks eliminate these risks through monolithic construction. Every curve is radiused (coved) for easy wiping, and the hardware is typically automated to ensure the user never has to touch a handle, preserving hand hygiene.
features: Seamless Construction: Made from 304 or 316L Stainless Steel with fully welded, radiused corners to eliminate cracks where biofilms can grow.
Hands-Free Operation: Equipped with infrared sensors, knee-operated panels, or foot pedals to prevent re-contaminating hands after washing.
Hygienic Drainage: Features a specialized "rear-set" or "conical" drain to prevent standing water and minimize splashing.
No Overflow Hole: Unlike domestic sinks, cleanroom models omit the overflow hole—a notorious breeding ground for bacteria and mold.
Integrated Backsplash: Deep-drawn, high-back designs to protect the surrounding cleanroom walls from moisture and spray.
Piping system made of 316L sanitary tubing
application_scenarios: Gowning Entry/Exit: Facilitating the mandatory hand-scrubbing protocols before staff enter sterile production areas.
Laboratory Tool Cleaning: Providing a contamination-free zone for rinsing high-precision glassware or sampling tools.
Aseptic Processing: Used in pharmaceutical formulation areas for necessary sanitation steps that require ultrapure water (WFI).
Compounding Pharmacies: Meeting USP <797> standards for hand hygiene prior to sterile drug preparation.
Biotech Sample Prep: Rinsing non-reactive components used in cell culture or genomic sequencing.
Medical Device Cleaning: Final-stage rinsing of surgical implants or instruments before they are moved to packaging.

products.name: Storage Rack
products.description: A modular, high-stability shelving unit constructed from non-shedding materials, designed for maximum airflow and easy decontamination in sterile or particulate-sensitive zones.
products.introduction: In a cleanroom, "standard" shelving is a liability. Particle-shedding paint, hidden rust, and flat surfaces that trap dust can ruin a production batch. Cleanroom Storage Racks solve this by using electropolished stainless steel and often feature wire-mesh or perforated designs. These specialized structures ensure that vertical laminar airflow (the "clean air shower" from the ceiling) can pass through the racks rather than being blocked, which prevents "dead zones" where contaminants might settle.
features: Open-Wire or Perforated Design: Minimizes surface area for dust collection and allows unobstructed vertical airflow.
Non-Shedding Materials: Typically made from 304 or 316L Stainless Steel, which does not flake, chip, or outgas.
Adjustable & Modular: Shelves can be repositioned without specialized tools that might generate metal shavings or debris.
High Load Capacity: Engineered for high weight-to-strength ratios to support heavy lab equipment or bulk chemical containers.
ESD Compatibility: Naturally conductive properties (often paired with grounding chains) to protect sensitive electronics from static discharge.
application_scenarios: WIP (Work-in-Progress) Staging: Holding semi-finished semiconductor wafers or medical devices between processing stages.
Sterile Supply Storage: Organizing autoclaved tools and surgical kits in hospital or pharmaceutical prep rooms.
Cooling/Drying Racks: Allowing freshly cleaned components to air-dry under HEPA-filtered flow.
Chemical Management: Storing non-reactive canisters and reagents in a visible, organized manner.
Cleanroom Shoe/Clog Storage: Used in gowning areas to keep specialized footwear off the floor and organized.
Electronics Housing: Holding circuit board racks or sensitive hardware during testing and assembly.

products.name: Mobile Work Platforms
products.description: A versatile, stainless steel mobile station featuring high-grade casters and an easy-to-sanitize surface, used to bring tools, laptops, or processing equipment directly to the point of need in a cleanroom.
products.introduction: In a dynamic cleanroom environment, fixed benchtop space is often limited. The Mobile Work Platform acts as a 'roving' sterile zone. Unlike standard utility carts, these platforms are designed with ergonomics and cleanliness in balance—ensuring that even as they move between different ISO zones, they do not track contaminants or harbor bacteria in their adjustment mechanisms.
features: Mobile & Maneuverable: Equipped with high-grade, non-marking casters (often with locking mechanisms) that allow the platform to be moved silently and precisely to any location within the facility.
Adjustable Height: Features a robust mechanical or pneumatic lift system, allowing operators to set the perfect ergonomic height for standing or seated work without compromising stability.
Easy-to-Clean Surfaces: Constructed from electropolished 304 or 316L stainless steel with minimal seams, crevices, or holes to prevent the accumulation of dust or microbial growth.
Load Capacity: Engineered to support significant weight—typically ranging from 100kg to 250kg—making them suitable for heavy equipment, bulk materials, or multiple workstations.
ESD Safe Options: Available with conductive casters and grounding straps to safely dissipate static electricity, protecting sensitive electronic components.
Access & Safety: Includes integrated handrails or guardrails to ensure personnel safety while working at height, compliant with cleanroom safety standards.
application_scenarios: Point-of-Use Assembly: Creating a temporary sterile workspace for the manual assembly of medical devices or electronic sensors.
Mobile Data Entry: Serving as a laptop or tablet station for technicians recording batch data directly next to production machinery.
Equipment Calibration: Supporting heavy testing instruments that need to be moved from one fixed station to another.
Aseptic Transfer: Moving sterile components from a pass-through hatch to a secondary processing area without hand-carrying.
Microbiological Sampling: Providing a stable, clean surface for environmental monitoring (EM) equipment during air and surface testing.
Temporary Tool Station: Holding specialized surgical or mechanical tools during long-duration maintenance tasks inside a sterile suite.
